meanings.definition: obstructed or blocked by an obstacle
meanings.sent1: The roadblocked path prevented us from reaching our destination.
meanings.sent2: The construction work roadblocked the usual route to the city.
meanings.sent3: The roadblocked street made the morning commute a bit more challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of failure roadblocked her from pursuing her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The fallen tree roadblocked the only way out of the forest.

meanings.definition: hindered or impeded in progress or movement
meanings.sent1: The roadblocked project delayed the team's presentation.
meanings.sent2: The heavy traffic roadblocked our journey to the airport.
meanings.sent3: The roadblocked schedule caused chaos in the office.
meanings.sent4: His lack of experience roadblocked his career advancement.
meanings.sent5: The storm roadblocked our plans for a picnic in the park.
